Name: HMS Hurworth
awards:
Atlantic 1941

Mediterranean 1942

Sicily 1943 - Aegean 1943
Displacement:
1,050 long tons (1,070 t) standard
1,430 long tons (1,450 t) full load
Propulsion:
Two Admiralty 3-drum boilers

Speed:
27 knots (31 mph; 50 km/h)
25.5 kn (29.3 mph; 47.2 km/h) full
Armament:
